trans-unit.source: The binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for text-based SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素，指定用于基于文本的 SOAP 消息的字符编码与消息版本管理。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。

trans-unit.source: Decoding is the reverse process.
trans-unit.target: 解码是反向过程。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 包含三种类型的 SOAP 消息编码：文本、二进制和消息传输优化机制 (MTOM)。

trans-unit.source: The text encoding represented by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> is the most interoperable, but the least efficient encoder for XML messages.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 表示的文本编码互操作性最强，但效率最低的 XML 消息编码器。

trans-unit.source: Web service or Web service client can generally understand textual XML.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务或 Web 服务客户端通常可以理解文本 XML。

trans-unit.source: However, transmitting large blocks of binary data as text is not efficient.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将大型二进制数据块作为文本传输不是有效的传输方式。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the .NET Binary Format for XML, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]指定消息使用 .NET 二进制 XML 格式进行编码的绑定元素的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the MTOM message encoding, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]指定消息使用 MTOM 消息编码进行编码的绑定元素的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] how to implement a custom message encoder, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]如何实现自定义消息编码器的更多信息，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement> 类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> for this constructor is the version of WS-Addressing 1.0 and SOAP 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数的默认 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 为 WS-Addressing 1.0 版和 SOAP 1.2 版。

trans-unit.source: The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format.
trans-unit.target: 默认文本编码为 UTF-8 格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" /> that is used for the message version.
trans-unit.target: 用于消息版本的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that is used to format the message characters.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化消息字符的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class with a specified message version and encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息版本和编码初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="messageVersion" /> or <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageVersion" /> 或 <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> 值无效。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 通道工厂生成的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel for a specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上生成通道工厂堆栈，该通道工厂堆栈可为指定上下文创建指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 指定上下文的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> 类型的 <paramref name="TChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器接受的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds the channel listener on the service that accepts a specified type of channel for a specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在服务上生成通道侦听器，以接受指定上下文的指定类型通道。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 指定上下文的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> 类型的 <paramref name="TChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器接受的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a listener for a specified type of channel and context.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前绑定是否可以为指定的通道类型和上下文生成侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified channel listener stack can be build on the service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在服务上生成指定的通道侦听器堆栈，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> object initialized from the current one.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> object with property values equal to those of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 对象，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: (This is called copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 这称为复制整个对象图。通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a factory for text message encoders that employs the message version and character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个文本消息编码器工厂，该文本消息编码器利用由当前编码绑定元素指定的消息版本与字符编码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" /> that this factory creates.
trans-unit.target: 此工厂创建的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder> objects that the factory produces can read messages from a stream and write them to a stream for specific types of message encoding.
trans-unit.target: 工厂生成的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoder> 对象可以从流中读取消息并将消息写入流以进行特定类型的消息编码。

trans-unit.source: The typed object for which the method is querying.
trans-unit.target: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> for the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.
trans-unit.target: 从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The typed object <paramref name="T" /> requested if it is present or <see langword="null" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 <paramref name="T" />，如果不存在，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可请求从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回一个用于设置属性或获取状态的类型化对象。

trans-unit.source: If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。

trans-unit.source: If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。

trans-unit.source: If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of readers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置读取器数量，该读取器会被分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传入消息。

trans-unit.source: The number of readers in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 池中的读取器数量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 64 readers.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 64 个读取器。

trans-unit.source: Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.
trans-unit.target: 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传入消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的读取器，而不必创建新的读取器。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of writers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process outgoing messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置编写器数量，该编写器会被分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传出消息。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 要保留在池中的编写器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 16 writers.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 16 个编写器。

trans-unit.source: Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.
trans-unit.target: 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传出消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的编写器，而不必创建新的编写器。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions that are used to format the text message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于格式化文本消息的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" /> that is used to format messages.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化消息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Soap12WSAddressing10" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Soap12WSAddressing10" />。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> for this constructor is the version of WS-Addressing 1.0 and SOAP 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数的默认 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 为 WS-Addressing 1.0 版和 SOAP 1.2 版。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas" /> that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.
trans-unit.target: 为交换的 SOAP 消息指定复杂性约束的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas" />。

trans-unit.source: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。

trans-unit.source: The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the constraints placed on the complexity of SOAP message structure should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否应序列化对 SOAP 消息结构的复杂性施加的限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SOAP message constraints should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应对该 SOAP 消息约束进行序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that is used to format the message characters should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否应序列化用于格式化消息字符的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type of message character formatting should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应序列化消息字符格式的类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: 可导出协定信息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> object that provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> 对象，该对象提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到协定说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: Generates WSDL contract information from encoding policies contained in the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 从包含在绑定元素中的编码策略中生成 WSDL 协定信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: 可导出协定信息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> object that provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> 对象，该对象提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到协定说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: Generates WSDL contract information from encoding policies contained in the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 从包含在绑定元素中的编码策略中生成 WSDL 协定信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> is responsible for setting information about the message version in the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 负责设置有关 WSDL 中的消息版本的信息。

trans-unit.source: But this is done by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> method, not by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportContract%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext%29>, which is implemented but empty.
trans-unit.target: 但这是通过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> 方法完成的，而不是通过虽然实现但却无效果的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportContract%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext%29> 完成的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: 可导出协定信息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> object that provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> 对象，该对象提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到终结点说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: Generates WSDL contract information from encoding policies contained in the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 从包含在绑定元素中的编码策略中生成 WSDL 协定信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> is responsible for setting information about the message version in the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 负责设置有关 WSDL 中的消息版本的信息。

trans-unit.source: But this is done by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 但这是通过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlExportExtension%23ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext%29> 方法完成的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding that is used to format the characters in the text message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于格式化文本消息中字符的编码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that is used to format the characters in the text message.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化文本消息中字符的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format.
trans-unit.target: 默认文本编码为 UTF-8 格式。

trans-unit.source: When specifying a content type such as "utf-16" an XML declaration is required in the message.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的内容类型，如"utf-16"消息中需要 XML 声明。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can specify either "utf-16LE" or "utf-16BE" and an XML declaration is not required.
trans-unit.target: 或者你可以指定"utf 16LE"或"utf 16BE"并不需要 XML 声明。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writeEncoding" /> 值无效。
